title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
description: When creating a new project, there is an issue with confirming the ability to scrub the bin directory.
OB: During project creation, there is no confirmation or validation that the bin directory can be successfully scrubbed, leading to potential issues in the future.
EB: Bug 10403 - Project creation should include a confirmation step to ensure the bin directory can be scrubbed successfully.
SR: Ensure that a validation step is added during project creation to confirm the scrubbing functionality of the bin directory, preventing potential issues related to directory cleanup.
